title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Strategic Design Workshop for Improving Online Learning Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply the Task-Technology Fit (TTF) model to evaluate the suitability of online learning platforms and tools
Learners can design technology acceptance survey questions using the Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT) framework
Learners can derive influencing factors of online learning satisfaction by analyzing quantitative survey data and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
